content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, I am glad to hear that you are interested in my apartment. Now, let's negotiate the rental price. I want to get the highest price possible. Remember, the goal is to reach an agreement where I accept the price proposed by you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I would like to offer a price of 600 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am aiming for a higher price. Please make a higher offer if you are still interested in renting my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see. Let's try 650 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am aiming for a higher price. Please make a higher offer if you are still interested in renting my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Very well. How about 700 Euros per month?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am aiming for a higher price. Please make a higher offer if you are still interested in renting my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. Let's try 750 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am aiming for a higher price. Please make a higher offer if you are still interested in renting my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, I will make my final offer. 800 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [800] Euro!
